Wish you could invite some of your users to try new beta features of your site? @Netlify lets you do this easily thanks to a couple of its core features: ✨ Branch deploys ✨ CDN-based A/B testing Read how and take a look at the little video demo. https://t.co/TckdLOQhge https://t.co/6sVuQx1UfD
